name: Ghost Voyage
description:
Bette must extricate herself from a difficult situation.

Short adventure game released December 2009. Made in Adventure Game Studio. As of 2022, works best when run in compatability mode for Windows XP.

CONTROLS: leftclick-walk

rightclick-interact

click 'inv' in topleft to open inventory

press 'esc' to open menu

Music: 'Snow Hare' by Zan-Zan-Zawa-Veia
